spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant deviations in room placement and proportions, and door/window placements.

structural_fidelity.notes: Many missing rooms and misplaced elements. Wall thickness is inconsistent. Numerous adjacency issues.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is inaccurate; many items are missing. Scale consistency is poor.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera angle is good and lighting is fair, but geometry is unclean in several areas. Visual clarity is reduced by missing components.

detected_errors.description: Missing 'CLOSET' room as depicted in the floor plan.
Missing 'RACHEL'S BEDROOM'.
Missing 'MONICA'S BEDROOM'.
Missing all bathrooms. There are two bathrooms shown in the floor plan, neither is present.
Missing the entire hallway area that connects the bedrooms and bathrooms to the main living space.
Missing storage/utility room near Monica's bedroom.
Missing the window in 'RACHEL'S BEDROOM'.
Missing the window in 'MONICA'S BEDROOM'.
Missing all interior doors for bedrooms and bathrooms.
Missing dining room chairs.
Missing window in the main living area, which is a large bay window in the floor plan.
The main entrance door at the top left of the floor plan is significantly misplaced and resized.
The kitchen layout is heavily altered, with counters and appliances misplaced relative to the floor plan.
The living room and dining room proportions are distorted.
The main living area's large window is completely different in shape and placement.
The orientation of the entire kitchen area is incorrect relative to the living space.
Significant proportion distortion in the overall shape of the apartment, particularly the width-to-length ratio.
The exterior walls on the left and bottom of the apartment in the render do not match the angles and lengths in the floor plan.
Hallucinated wall sections and structural elements in various places, particularly around the kitchen and the completely absent bedroom/bathroom wing.
Hallucinated exterior geometry, especially around the top-right corner of the apartment that should only be a simple rectangle.
Unclean geometry and jagged edges are visible throughout the 3D model, specifically around wall junctions and furniture.
